meanings.definition: The formation of white blood cells.
meanings.sent1: Leukopoiesis is essential for fighting infections.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study leukopoiesis to understand the immune system better.
meanings.sent3: During the game of tag, the children pretended their white blood cells were superheroes in leukopoiesis.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against illness, leukopoiesis acts as an army of defenders.
meanings.sent5: The factory of leukopoiesis in the body works tirelessly to keep us healthy.

meanings.sent1: Leukopoiesis helps the body recover from injuries.
meanings.sent2: Athletes need proper nutrition for efficient leukopoiesis.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that cooking a hearty meal was like leukopoiesis for the immune system.
meanings.sent4: In the bone marrow factory, leukopoiesis churns out the body's defenders.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained leukopoiesis with colorful illustrations to make it easier to remember.
